extensionDescription.message: Generates a table of contents for your Gemini chats for easy navigation.
extensionDescription.description: A brief description of the extension.

emptyTocMessage.message: No user prompts found in this chat yet.
emptyTocMessage.description: Message displayed when the table of contents is empty.

attachmentLabel.description: Label for a user message that contains only an attachment and no text.

clickToPin.description: Tooltip for the entry icon when the outline is not pinned.

unpin.description: Tooltip for the entry icon when the outline is pinned.
